Taha Rostami

SELECTED CHESS GAMESABOUTPROJECTSPUBLICATIONS

Publications

2022

A heuristic function for improving the prediction accuracy of fault revealing mutants

We propose a method that employs a heuristic function to create an artificial view of the training data set; then, it trains two classifiers, one with the original view and one with the artificial view. Finally, it combines the opinions of trained models to predict fault-revealing mutants.

2021

A method for improving predictive mutation testing that considers the impacts of missing data

By studying the papers, data, and codes of Predictive Mutation Testing research, it was observed that the data used in these studies contained many missing data that were ignored by the existing methods. Therefore, we propose a method able to handle the missing values.
